Sentencas: Ultra-low sulphur diesel (ULSD) is the preferred fuel for mobile auxiliary power units (APU).
Titulo: A techno-economic comparison of fuel processors utilizing diesel for solid oxide fuel cell auxiliary power units

Sentencas: The commercial available technologies in the kW-range are combustion engine based gensets, achieving system efficiencies about 20%.
Titulo: A techno-economic comparison of fuel processors utilizing diesel for solid oxide fuel cell auxiliary power units

Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) promise improvements with respect to efficiency and emission, particularly for the low power range.
Titulo: A techno-economic comparison of fuel processors utilizing diesel for solid oxide fuel cell auxiliary power units

Sentencas: Fuel processing methods i.e., catalytic partial oxidation, autothermal reforming and steam reforming have been demonstrated to operate on diesel with various sulphur contents.
Titulo: A techno-economic comparison of fuel processors utilizing diesel for solid oxide fuel cell auxiliary power units

Sentencas: The choice of fuel processing method strongly affects the SOFC's system efficiency and power density.
Titulo: A techno-economic comparison of fuel processors utilizing diesel for solid oxide fuel cell auxiliary power units

Sentencas: This paper investigates the impact of fuel processing methods on the economical potential in SOFC APUs, taking variable and capital cost into account.

Sentencas: Autonomous concepts without any external water supply are compared with anode recycle configurations.

Sentencas: The cost of electricity is very sensitive on the choice of the O/C ratio and the temperature conditions of the fuel processor.

Sentencas: A sensitivity analysis is applied to identify the most cost effective concept for different economic boundary conditions.
